channel.title: Changing things in the .java files doesn't change anything!
channel.description:
Ok, for example I follow the tutorial to change the place where people start when they first create a character. I open client.java from TestScape Source\client.java, search for [code]removeAllItems(); [/code]Changed these coords: [code] teleportToX = 3267; teleportToY = 3428;[/code] Then I save client.java and run compile.bat. I run moparscape and create a new character, but I'm still at the coords the Client.java originally had. Does anybody know how to fix this?
Oh, and compiler.bat doesn't give any errors.
Edit: Found my answer :P There where more [code]removeAllItems(); [/code] I just edited all of them.

item.title: Changing things in the .java files doesn't change anything!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Make sure you save it… one thing and its not going to work if you get errors when u compile it , that means u did soemthing wrong.But if u don’t get error’s when compiling and your making a tele command then just make a new tele command…ill try to egt a exmaple

EXP
ok say this is what your changing

removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you got p00ned!"); PoisonDelay = 9999999; setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
So to make a new one push enter with your cursor at the last } and paste this under it then change the teleports to what you want so your’s would look like this…

removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you got p00ned!"); PoisonDelay = 9999999; setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3267; teleportToY = 3428; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you got p00ned!"); PoisonDelay = 9999999; setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
then save and compile then run server and test to see if it worked

Read full topic
item.source: Changing things in the .java files doesn't change anything!

item.title: Changing things in the .java files doesn't change anything!
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

right make sure your on your own server not hybridscape!!

use compile.bat (in your source folder … keeping it running) log onto moparscape (without changing the ip addy… that will be your server

Read full topic
